name: Race After 1977
description:
The world was devastated on the nuclear war. The only way around now is through driving. The driver now is the King! Show them how kingly you are by driving your vehicle through every imaginable terrain and obstacles there is. Send your car through walls, jump, slide, swerve and leap to your victory!

Race After 1977 also features; 10 tracks across 5 different environments, High-End graphics, 12 different scrapped-together 70’s vehicles, Compete in multiple tournaments to unlock new vehicles and tracks, 50 achievements & 10 different player levels and 3D sound and effects!
